pages.text: An imperfect ritual that reduces enchantment levels and removes the enhancement mark from items. This ritual downgrades all enchantments by one level.$(br2)$(bold)Setup:$()$(br)Place a Bookshelf on top of an Imperfect Ritual Stone.$(br2)$(bold)Cost:$() 1000 LP per use$(br2)$(bold)Note:$() The ritual has no persistent effect - it activates once and completes immediately. The stone can be reused.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$()$(br)1. Hold the item in your mainhand$(br)2. Right-click the Imperfect Ritual Stone$(br)3. All enchantments lose 1 level$(br)4. Enhancement mark is removed$(br)5. The stone remains for reuse$(br2)$(bold)Applications:$()$(li)Reverse Enhancement ritual$(li)Downgrade enchantments$(li)Enchantments won't go below level 1$(br2)$(italic)Balance the scales of power.$()
